page.title: 02HOME LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF AN ELEVEN YEAR OLD BOY IN NEWBRIDGE My day starts typically by rising even though I don't want to.Once up,I dress, go downstairs and breakfast on branflakes.Next I pack my gym kit, homework book, dinner money and pencil case in my canvas schoolbag.I travel to school on a 25 seater bus.On arrival I usually take in the milk for pupils under 7.I normally play British Bulldogs, football or motorbikes until bell time at 8.58am.In school my work includes mathematics, language, craft, project, physical education, singing and religious education.My favourite subject is art and my favourite sport is vaulting.Once school is over I arrive home at 3.40pm when I watch television till teatime.I go to bed at 9.30pm while my brother goes at 10.00pm. I wish I could go then.
